Quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Quotes.author: Robert Collier

Quotes.quote: Little by little, one travels far.
Quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

Quotes.quote: Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
Quotes.author: Robin Sharma

Quotes.quote: Slow and steady wins the race.
Quotes.author: Aesop

Quotes.quote: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
Quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

Quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Quotes.author: Lao Tzu

Quotes.quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
Quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

Quotes.quote: You donâ€™t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Quotes.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
Quotes.author: Peter Marshall

Quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Quotes.author: Sam Levenson

Quotes.quote: Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection.
Quotes.author: Mark Twain

Quotes.quote: One step at a time is good walking.
Quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

Quotes.quote: Tiny steps will get you to your goal just as surely as great leaps.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
Quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

Quotes.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
Quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

Quotes.quote: A little progress each day adds up to big results.
Quotes.author: Satya Nani

Quotes.quote: Rome wasn't built in a day, but they were laying bricks every hour.
Quotes.author: John Heywood

Quotes.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
Quotes.author: Walter Elliot

Quotes.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Quotes.author: Confucius

Quotes.quote: Don't despise the small beginnings.
Quotes.author: Zechariah 4:10
